itemDescription: British publisher, writer, and political economic pamphleteer

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Ernest John Pickstone Benn, 2nd Baronet,  (25 June 1875 – 17 January 1954) was a British publisher, writer and political publicist. His father, John Benn, was a politician, who had been made a baronet in 1914. He was an uncle of the Labour politician Tony Benn.
